author: jim
msg: Add in the UseCanonicalPhysicalPort directive, which
use the physical port when constructing the
canonical port. Also add the exact ordering to
the docs, so people can easily see how it works.
We now have compatibility with both 2.0 and 1.3.

author: brett
msg: updated pom in accordance with m1 pom

author: stevel
msg: no, we do not want the ?string as the path to a request. Setting the path is probably entirely gratuitous if the constructor worked correctly, but deleting this line is left to someone more knowledgeable of httpclient.
